May 6, 2017
  • Felther's Campout Hash Hash Run
    Start: 3:00 pm
    Date: May 6, 2017  - 2 weeks from now
    Location: Governor Dodge State Park, 4175 Wisconsin 23, Dodgeville, WI 53533, USA

    Description:  

    WHO: You and all your 'friends'
    WHAT: Hashing, Camping, Drinking, Running, Staggering, Sleeping, Shagging, Drinking, Swimming, Lounging, Drinking.
    Trail Times:
    Friday: 7 pm
    Saturday: 5 pm
    Sunday Hangover: 10:30 am
    I have a relatively secluded Group Site reserved for Friday and Saturday Night. There will be a Friday evening trail and the standard Saturday afternoon trail. Possible Sunday trail as well.
    $10 per night of camping (includes hash cash for runs!) This is tent camping only, no RVs or trailers. Flush toilets and showers are very close. Pit toilets stumbling distance away.
    Not interested in camping, but still want to Hash?
    Standard $5 Hash cash for Saturday run.
    One keg of beer will obviously be provided for the weekend. Other than light snacks, FOOD WILL NOT BE PROVIDED. Bring your own food, and probably some beer if you want variety.
    Dogs allowed (must stay on 8ft leash).
    What to bring:
    Headlamp (for Friday trail/general camp light)
    Food/Snacks
    Dishes for your food/snacks
    a Vessel (for drinking)
    Chair
    Tent/sleeping bag/other camp utilities (if camping)
    Change of clothes/shoes
    Insect repellent
    Sunscreen
    Extra BOOZE
    Virgins!
    Prophylactics (if your lucky)
    Swim Gear if the weather is nice
    Firewood
    What not to bring:
    RV/Campers
    Minors
    Untrained/unsociable dogs/family/friends
    Illegal Drugs (park rangers go out of there way to look for 'em)
    -felter smelter
